decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The demolition must be completed within 5 years of the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed demolition shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the approved details contained in the application and the documents submitted (0700 rev P00 and cover letter from DWD Property + Planning dated 12 April 2018 received on 16/04/2018. Site Waste Management Plan ref. 01/DB/DB (132-18) prepared by Hughes & Salvidge, Construction Phase Plan (Demolition Section Only) ref. HSP-T132-18_01 - Cargo Services Centre prepared by Hughes & Salvidge, Method Statement ref. 132-18 prepared by Hughes & Salvidge and Demolition Environmental Management Plan prepared by Hughes & Salvidge received on 08/05/2018.Email from Nick Bowne at DWD Property + Planning dated 11/05/2018 10:24 received on 11/05/2018) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 3 - Notwithstanding the approved details all deliveries to or collections from the site using Heavy Goods Vehicles shall be carried out between the hours of 9.30 and 15.00.
description: Notification of demolition of the existing warehouse building is proposed in order to facilitate the future redevelopment of the cargo services centre site
